AccountId.description: Unique identifier for an account. On each chain this is unique.

seq.description: Unique identifier for the accounts create on a local chain. Is reused when creating an interchain account.

trace.description: Sequence of the chain that triggered the IBC account creation `AccountTrace::Local` if the account was created locally Example: Account created on Juno which has an abstract interchain account on Osmosis, which in turn creates an interchain account on Terra -> `AccountTrace::Remote(vec!["juno", "osmosis"])`

AccountTrace.description: The identifier of chain that triggered the account creation

TruncatedChainId.description: The name of a chain, aka the chain-id without the post-fix number. ex. `cosmoshub-4` -> `cosmoshub`, `juno-1` -> `juno`
